subject: Re: Duracube new website Project page
preview: +15 mins to update order of projects - request sent to chris' email, screenshot attached.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body: +15 mins to update order of projects - request sent to chris' email, screenshot attached.

Hi Belinda}, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://duracube.com.au/projects/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi @rika,

Please see below from Belinda at Duracube.

The task is to replace page https://duracube.com.au/projects/ with https://duracube.com.au/project-archive

Please note that the URL will need to be updated to https://duracube.com.au/projects/

Please let me know if you need any more info, thanks!

Hi Chris,

Thank you for all the work done on the Projects page so far. 👍

Please add the new layout Projects page to the main navigation.

The sales representatives are wanting to show the new projects that have been completed.

Kind Regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist


13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750

1300 387 228 <tel:1300387228>

belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au <mailto:belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au>

End of Year Closure: Last day is 20th December 2023. Reopen on 8th January 2024.


<https://app.signite.io/assets/9aa76599-5b95-4b78-ab4c-2d0ca51e7b46/url>







On Mon, 11 Dec 2023 at 13:34, Chris Paradowski <chris@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:chris@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
> Hi Belinda,
>
> We will indeed continue with the project upload and loop back once complete.
>
> Noted, I should have clarified. Unfortunately, the Christmas effect is in full swing this year.
>
> We’ll stand by for updates on industry sector tabs.
>
> In regards to the page: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/ by definition it is live and can be viewed by anyone with the URL. For the puporse of sharing it with your partners, it is ready to go.
>
> If you would like it added to the main navigation, please let me know and we will do so.
>
> Regards,
>
>
>
> Chris Paradowski
> Partnerships Manager

>>>> On Mon, 11 Dec 2023 at 10:40, Chris Paradowski <chris@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:chris@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
>>>>> Hi Belinda,
>>>>>
>>>>> Thanks and likewise!
>>>>>
>>>>> New project page - Yes, the page is viewable via the following link: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/ (no need to log into the WordPress dashboard).
>>>>>
>>>>> 6 new case studies - The team had made a start on Bill Ball Oval and BHP Olympic Dam, I have asked them to stop with the upload and away further instructions.
>>>>>
>>>>> Industry Sector - I presume when you say search, you are referring to a “sort” function, is that correct? If so, it would take approximately 2-3 hours depending on how you’d like them to appear. I recall we spoke about having the industry sectors separate from the product sort. We would need a little more info to complete.
>>>>>
>>>>> In light of Ben’s request, I feel it appropriate to get his approval to proceed before starting on further updates.
>>>>>
>>>>> Thanks and speak soon,

>>>>>> On 11 Dec 2023, at 10:15 am, Belinda Henderson <belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au <mailto:belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au>> wrote:
>>>>>>
>>>>>> Hi Chris,
>>>>>>
>>>>>> I hope you had an enjoyable weekend.
>>>>>>
>>>>>> I just finished a marketing meeting.
>>>>>>
>>>>>> Topic 1.
>>>>>> I am wondering if it would be possible for the new Projects page to go live tomorrow morning to show the Digilari team in our meeting at 1pm tomorrow.
>>>>>>
>>>>>> Apparently they are coming up with a Canva mock-up and it may be unnecessary.
>>>>>>
>>>>>> It may be ok to go live with some of the minor amendments not finished.
>>>>>>
>>>>>> Also we do not need to go live with the 6 new case study stories sent on Friday afternoon.
>>>>>>
>>>>>> Topic 2.
>>>>>> How long would it take to add the Industry Sector search buttons to the Projects page?
>>>>>> Health
>>>>>> Education
>>>>>> Commercial
>>>>>> Infrastructure
>>>>>> Sports & Recreation
>>>>>> Factories & Warehouse
>>>>>> Ben said to get Digilari to do this but I think it may be easier for you to do it as you have done all the other amendments.
>>>>>>
>>>>>> You can call me to discuss the above if it is easier.
>>>>>>
>>>>>> Kind regards,
>>>>>> Belinda Henderson
>>>>>> Marketing Specialist
>>>>>> Phone: 1300 387 228 Mobile: 0401 298 893
>>>>>> Address: 13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750
